title: The U.N. Is Powerless to Help Gaza. That's How the U.S. Wants It.
description:
The five permanent members of the Security Council — notably the U.S. and Russia — use their veto power to keep wars going.

The post The U.N. Is Powerless to Help Gaza. That’s How the U.S. Wants It. appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Sen. John Fetterman’s Former Campaign Staffers Urge Him to Support Israel-Hamas Ceasefire
description:
“It is not too late to change your stance and stand on the righteous side of history,” 16 former campaign staffers wrote in an open letter.

The post Sen. John Fetterman’s Former Campaign Staffers Urge Him to Support Israel-Hamas Ceasefire appeared first on The Intercept.
